channel.title: Need hoster 24/7
channel.description:
We have a great server with great staff. normally was i hosting the server but i can't run it 24/7 and there coming more and more players so let's get a 24/7 hoster. this is what u get: A in-game status of admin. A forum name a hoster. our new forums are: http://blackchaos.findtalk.net/forum.htm
please pm me on the forums if u want to host
thanks
